title: CYOA The Abominable Snowman.iso
description:
One of the most popular book series of all time, CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTUREÃ‚Â® comes to life in this revolutionary interactive DVD that puts YOU in control of the action!

When Uncle Rudy (William H. Macy) goes missing in the Himalayan Mountains while looking for the mythical Yeti creature, the North family - Benjamin (Frankie Muniz), Crista (Lacey Chabert), and Marco (Daryl Sabara) - rise to the heights of adventure to find him. Will they rescue their Uncle and discover the secret of the Yeti (also known as The Abominable Snowman)? Or will dangerous avalanches, evil poachers, and hungry tigers foil their plans? It's up to you to decide - their fate is in your hands. So grab your remote control and get ready to Choose Your Own AdventureÃ‚Â®!

BONUS Features:
* Behind-the-Scenes Featurette
* "In the Shadow of the Himalayas: How People Live in Nepal," a 20-minute Educational Documentary
* Music Video
* Collectible Travel Journal
* Widescreen Presentation Enhanced for 16:9 Televisions

There are 11 possible stories.  What happens next is up to you.
